Or add the ability to resolve the dir structure of any perl script using the Initiator - obs has to be called only once ...

https://stackoverflow.com/a/90721/65706

export issue_tracker_project=""; bash src/bash/issue-tracker/issue-tracker.sh -a run-integration-tests
